description: Retrieves the list of tags (keys and values) assigned to the resource.

parameters.name: ResourceArn
parameters.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the resource to retrieve tags from.

nested_items.name: Tags
nested_items.description: The tags used to organize, track, or control access for the resource. For example, { 'tags': {'key1':'value1', 'key2':'value2'} }.

nested_items.name: Key
nested_items.description: The key of the key-value tag.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the key-value tag.
